item.title: ET
item.description: score:-28 Chances: Improved efficiency in working capital and profitability expected for 2024 12 best February dividend stocks to buy now Energy stocks offer growth and income for a value price this month Robust income streams from energy sector master limited partnerships Risks: Energy Transfer LP’s controversial Dakota Access Pipeline leaving oil line’s fate in limbo amid extensive environmental review Biden administration warning against shutting down the Dakota Access Pipeline Impact of higher operating expenses on Nextracker’s fiscal third-quarter results Score:-28 chances characters count - risks characters count = -28
